the baby 's grandpa got up to make a speech .

output.sentences: We got together at church for my son's dedication.
My dad read a verse from the bible.
My dad, and brothers got together to take a picture.
I am so happy that my sister was able to make it too.
What fond memories I will have with all of my family together.
